QuestData.Title: Ellia Ravenmane: Revenge
QuestData.Description: Your "rival" has appeared again. Ellia Ravenmane has been avoiding her duties on the island, instead focusing on personal training, with the intent to defeat you in battle.$b$b"I will destroy $n," she said.$b$bI have honored her request for a rematch, but I will be keeping a close eye on her. Her motives may be shifting in a dangerous direction.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Ellia has returned, and she's determined to defeat her rival.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Ellia Ravenmane at Dome Balrissa.
